Package org.jaspr.hr.demo

Class SqliteResultsDAO

java.lang.Object
org.jaspr.hr.demo.SqliteResultsDAO
public class SqliteResultsDAO extends Object
Class to handle database interactions related to storing quiz and question results

  • Constructor Details

    • SqliteResultsDAO

      public SqliteResultsDAO()
      Open database connection and create tables

  • Method Details

    • addQuestionResult

      public void addQuestionResult(int quizID, int questionID, int studentID, int grade)
      Add a question result to the database
      Parameters:
      quizID - id of the quiz that the question belongs to
      questionID - id of the question being answered
      studentID - id of the student who answered the question
      grade - grade, 1 for correct or 0 for incorrect

    • addQuizResult

      public void addQuizResult(int quizID, int studentID, double grade)
      Add a quiz result to the database
      Parameters:
      quizID - id of the quiz
      studentID - id of the student who took the quiz
      grade - percentage of correct answers

    • getResultsByQuestion

      public List<Map<String,Object>> getResultsByQuestion(int quizID, int studentID)
      Fetch the results for each question in a given quiz taken by a given student
      Parameters:
      quizID - the id of the quiz that the questions belong to
      studentID - the id of the student who took the quiz
      Returns:
      a list containing the question, the result and the correct answer

    • getGrade

      public Integer getGrade(int quizID, int studentID)
      Fetch only the grade for a quiz
      Parameters:
      quizID - the id of the quiz that is being marked
      studentID - the id of the student who took the quiz
      Returns:
      the grade that the student received for the quiz as an integer

    • getResultsByQuiz

      public List<Map<String,Object>> getResultsByQuiz(int studentID)
      Fetch all the quiz results for a particular student
      Parameters:
      studentID - the id of the student whose results are desired
      Returns:
      a list of quiz titles and results for the student

    • getQuestionAccuracyForQuiz

      public Map<Integer,Double> getQuestionAccuracyForQuiz(int quizId, int classroomId)

    • getStudentGradesForQuiz

      public List<Map<String,String>> getStudentGradesForQuiz(int quizId, int classroomNumber)
